author: jukka
msg: Use variable-length serialization for LONG values, and leverage that also for DATE serialization together with an encoding that maps dates (millisecond accuracy, with timezone offsets) to 64 bits.

author: sebb
msg: NET-341 FTPClient.remoteAppend(String filename) uses STOR instead of APPE

author: julianfoad
msg: Simplify a WC DB function.  Remove a DB scan and a string compare, and
simply update the row in the same way every time.

author: julianfoad
msg: In the WC-DB, ensure every 'incomplete' row has its revision number set, as
this is logically meant to be there, though apparently not currently needed.
Rename and re-use the function for inserting these 'incomplete' rows.
(insert_working_node, svn_wc__db_op_copy): Pass the revision number to
